title: AIChE Student Competition Briefing
description: Get a head start on major AIChE competitions like Chem-E-Car, Chem-E-Cube, and the Student Poster Competition. Learn the rules and form your teams!
details: This session is the official kickoff for the competition season. We will provide a detailed briefing on several key AIChE student competitions, including Chem-E-Car and Chem-E-Cube. We'll cover the objectives, rules, timelines, and tips for success. This is the perfect time to ask questions, find teammates, and start brainstorming your winning ideas.

title: AIChE Week â€“ Hackathon
description: A week-long, high-intensity hackathon where teams will solve a real-world chemical engineering problem provided by an industry partner.
details: The highlight of our competitive calendar! In partnership with a major company like ExxonMobil or Sembcorp, we will host a week-long hackathon. Teams will be presented with a real-world industry challenge and will have one week to develop an innovative solution. The event will culminate in a presentation day where teams pitch their ideas to a panel of judges. The winners will be announced at the NTU x NUS exchange day.
